meaning_str.bing:
adv. 每个
adj. 每
pron. 每
网络. 各；各自；每一

1.en: As each case of breast cancer is different, every woman should talk with her doctor about her personal risk factors for breast cancer.
1.cn: 鉴于乳腺癌病情的差异性，妇女们应该根据个人的情况，向医生反映可能的致病因素。

2.en: As our Christmas Boy grew, he made it clear that only he had the expertise to select and decorate the Christmas tree each year.
2.cn: 随着圣诞男孩的长大，他清楚地向大家表明只有他才有本事选择和装饰一年一度的圣诞树。

3.en: One player of each group pulls out a strip of paper and reads the sentence on it silently and does not show it to the other classmates.
3.cn: 小组里的一个人抽出一张纸条并默读上面的句子，不可以把它展现给其他的成员看。

0.en: Each airport's control tower guides each plane to take off.
0.cn: 每个机场的控制塔能指导每架飞机起飞。

1.en: Each loss is unbearable, but when it's someone you know...
1.cn: 每个生命都弥足珍贵，尤其是你熟悉的生命。

2.en: But I look forward to getting to know each and every one of you.
2.cn: 我很希望认识你们每个人。

3.en: Each puzzle will lead you to the location of the next.
3.cn: 每个谜题将会指引诸位去下一个地点。

4.en: Each person's landing pod had enough life support for two years.
4.cn: 每个人的着陆舱里携带着两年的补给。

5.en: Each of us has a code for our optimal physical condition.
5.cn: 我们每个人都有自己身体最佳状况的遗传密码。

6.en: We've become alienated from each other. Each one an island onto himself, concerned only with ourselves.
6.cn: 我们都互相疏远了，每个人都活在自己的世界里，只关心自己的问题。

7.en: I say this I shall stand for him as he has for each of you.
7.cn: 我说我会支持他，一如他支持你们每个人一样。

8.en: First thing I'm going to do is hear motions from each of the defendants' lawyers.
8.cn: 首先我要听取每个辨方律师的诉讼请求。

9.en: When I blow my whistle, I want each of you to kick off from the ground, hard.
9.cn: 我一吹哨子，你们每个人都用力蹬地，腾空。

10.en: And each one needs fuel so it can supply power 365 days a year.
10.cn: 每个电站都要消耗能量，所以才能1年365天不间断供电。

11.en: No, I'm glad to have shared in you perils, Thorin, each and every one of them.
11.cn: 我很高兴能和你患难与共，索林，和你们每个人。

12.en: State funeral. Must-attend event for western leaders. Each one a target.
12.cn: 国葬仪式，西方领导人必定出席的事件，每个人都是目标。

13.en: At the end of each stage of training, the lowestranking initiates will be leaving us.
13.cn: 训练的每个阶段，排名倒数的新生们将会离开无畏派。

14.en: Each of these spinning points of light represents the readings from thousands of sensors.
14.cn: 其中每个旋转的光点都是成千上万的传感器发出的。

15.en: When mankind discovers who we are, what we can do, each of us will face a choice.
15.cn: 等人类发现我们，我们的能力，我们每个人就会面临选择。

16.en: So, I am grateful to each and every one of you for coming out and showing your support today.
16.cn: 所以我很感激你们每个人今天前来表示对我的支持。

17.en: If I could, I would run each and every one of you viewers up a flagpole and salute you.
17.cn: 如果可以，你们每个人都是我升上去后愿意敬礼的旗帜。

18.en: Okay, so each welcome bag gets a schedule of events, a map, and chocolate from me.
18.cn: 每个迎宾礼袋中含有一张婚礼时间表，一份地图和我送的巧克力。

19.en: And each core memory powers a different aspect of Riley's personality. Like. Hockey Island.
19.cn: 每个核心记忆都会强化莱莉个性的某个方面，比如，冰球岛。
